event.title: 11/2 International Friends Party @ SONIDO'S TOKYO Roppongi * 3.5h All-You-Can-Drink * Girls:FREE * 1000円OFF
event.description:
下記の日本語をご覧下さい 1000 Yen OFF with reservation and all details at:
10/31 HALLOWEEN PARTY 2018 @ JP TOKYO Roppongi http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=halloween -
11/2 Intl. Friends Party @ SONIDO’S TOKYO http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyo_party -
11/3 Intl. Friends Party Shibuya @ KITSUNE http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=internationalfriendsparty -
Japanese Guys: 2000 Yen
Japanese Girls: 1000 Yen
Foreign Guys: 1000 Yen
Foreign Girls: FREE !!
Birthday Present: FREE Entry, if your birthday is in November.

- Every week, tons of people join Tokyo’s #1 International Party !!
- Make lots of new friends currently staying in this crazy city
- 3 hours All-You-Can-Drink Cocktails, Beer, Wine, Softdrinks etc.
- ’Cause the best night you will never remember ;-)
- Find romance or have great conversation with some cool new people.
- The party is what you make it!!!

10/31 (Wed) Best HALLOWEEN PARTY TOKYO 2018 @ JP TOKYO Roppongi * All-You-Can-Drink
20:00~5:00 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/qpjTovrCX2s
Address: Yoko Central Bldg. 6F,[masked] Roppongi, Minato-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=halloween

11/2 (Fri) Tokyo Intl. Friends Party @ SONIDO’S TOKYO Roppongi
20:00~23:30 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/BFLqiyAf3Wt
Address: Shimojo Bldg. B1F,[masked] Roppongi, Minato-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyo_party

11/3 (Sat) NEW International Friends Party Tokyo @ KITSUNE Shibuya
20:15~23:15 - Map: https://goo.gl/maps/6oHFPbtDt8C2
Address: Chatelet Shibuya B1F,[masked] Higashi, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=internationalfriendsparty
--
こちらからの予約で1000円OFF！！
10/31 #1 ハッピー・ハロウィンパーティー @ JP TOKYO 六本木 http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?p=halloween -
11/2 国際交流パーティー 東京 @ SONIDO’S TOKYO 六本木 http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?p=tokyo_party -
11/3 国際交流パーティー 渋谷 @ KITSUNE http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?p=internationalfriendsparty -

女性： 1000円 （今回のスペシャル： 25歳以下は無料です）
誕生日プレゼント： 11月が誕生日の方は無料になります。
